title.rendered: LIBERTYZENO Turns Totally Genuine Leather Shoes Store for Men, Women and Kids Footwear

content.rendered:
Black Oxford Shoe

Leather Shoes

Monk Straps Shoes

Considering the amazing feedback from its customers towards its genuine leather shoes, LIBERTYZENO turns into a fully genuine leather online shoe shop.

Based on our regular customer’s consistent feedback, we turned into a total genuine leather shoe store because they have ranked our leather products, styles, and look among the top over others.”

— Vijay Sawhney, President of LIBERTYZENO

WESTMONT, ILLINOIS, UNITED STATES, June 1, 2023/EINPresswire.com/ — The global leather footwear market is expected to breach the 159130 Million USD mark over 2022-2026. Plus, the benefits of wearing genuine leather shoes are so many that LIBERTYZENO decided to do a full leather online shoe store for men, women and kids. It has relaunched its whole collection as the entire range of full-grain leather and genuine leather shoes in the USA. Turning eco-friendly and based on the loyal customers’ sales data, LIBERTYZENO has done away with man-made leather products and have revamped its entire shoe collection of exclusive, customized & handmade shoes. A new range of women’s and kid’s shoes are also being added in genuine leather.

LIBERTY SHOES INC took this major step all the more because genuine leather shoes are far more durable than any other; being crafted in leather makes the full grain leather shoes naturally – breathable, stretch-to-fit and whole-day comfy. Men and kids are always on their toes at work or play, so these are better fitting and comfortable as they are actual cowhide (skin) fitting over the skin. Leather shoes can be crafted into any style being easy to maintain. Plus the feet get a good layer of natural protection due to their longtime durability. Thus, the company already occupies a large chunk of the genuine leather shoes market in the USA.

Shoe Styles that LIBERTYZENO offers in full grain leather shoes for men are Oxfords, Chukka Boots, Derby, Croco Print, Boot, Casual, Loafers, Leather Shoes, Two Tone, Cap Toe, and more. The store has just added some stylish Loafers to the women’s collection. The company is aiming to fast expand the range in the festive months to come. The kid’s collection is already a rage in the USA due to its comfort and style quotients. You can checkout their latest arrivals in premium leather shoes in styles, designs, and fashion quotient that is at par with the global fashion excellence.

About LIBERTYZENO

Established in 2002, Liberty Shoes Inc. (DBA Liberty Footwear) has been bringing you exclusive designs and world-class leather shoes via its flagship brand LIBERTYZENO.

Vijay Sawhney
LIBERTYZENO
06307962337

LIBERTYZENO Leather Shoes to Enhance the Look
